Html:
Would it be possible to goto Netflix create the ability to play streaming content from them and others such as Hulu Crackle providers.

I'd really love to be able to view Netflix and all my streaming content and ITunes content on my oculus with this type of app.

Hi maddabbo,

Currently it's not possible because of the DRM.

I see 2 possible solutions:

-Playing netflix on a second monitor, capture the stream and project the result in VR Player. You can try with File->Open->Process but it's very slow. I would have to create a new directX implementation for capturing the screen instead of the process. (This feature is in my backlog)

-The second solution would be to integrate a web browser in VR Player. An other feature planned for future versions.

If some one has a better idea, please let me know :)

-Stephane
